name: Zephaniah Marion
coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager of Trimmerwork,   


My name is Zephaniah Marion...A little about me…

I am 29 yrs. old, a native of Pennsylvania, and now a resident of Los Angeles. I came to California to be apart of this industry. I’ve been in this business around 10 years because Cannabis is my number one love. Growing, Trimming, extracting … all of it! 

Here’s what I offer your company: 

I have 10 years trimming experience in all strains. I have experience in both wet and dry trimming. I can trim two pounds a day with two sets of Fiskars, a glass of rubbing alcohol aka scissor soak and have two pounds of product trimmed and ready per day.

I can work local i.e. Los Angeles county area without accommodations. If at a remote location I would need food and shelter or I can provide tent.  

In addition, I also offer 10 years of solid grow experience and 2 years of study at NPK University. I have grown and cultivated dank weed, monster grows and have done extractions of all kind. I’ve done indoor grows (scrog, sog) and outdoor grow (monster, guerilla) as well.

 I happily offer your company my knowledge of the following: trimming, drying, and curing. I also gladly offer my knowledge of keif, oil, dab, and rosin extraction. I also have considerable experience cooking edibles, pressing hash etc.) 

I just completed a job at 710 Gas Station Dispensary here in Los Angeles where I performed the following: Dry ice Kief extraction, grow room electrical, master grower cultivation assistance and farm labor.

Thank you for your time. I would love to be a part of your company and contribute to what I believe is the number one product that has arrived on the market. I am a fast learner, have a reliable vehicle, and ready to work long hours. I can start work ASAP. I have attached my resume bellow.

Thank You,

Zephaniah Marion 
431 N Wilson Ave Pasadena, CA 91106 
213.804.8444 
Zmarion@yahoo.com www.facebook.com/ Zephaniahmarion

ZEPHANIAH W. MARION
431 N. Wilson Ave #5
Pasadena, CA 91106
Zmarion@yahoo.com
213.804.8444
www.facebook.com/ZephaniahMarion
EDUCATION
Wallenpaupack High School, Pennsylvania, 2007. NPK University, Online Gardening University 2015-2017.
 
OBJECTIVE
To grow as well as cultivate dynamic strains utilizing my experience in cultivating/extracting/manufacturing to reach and expand your consumer base.
 
SKILLS
GROWING: Advanced organic soil cultivator and cannabis strain creator:
• Cannabis hybrid creator and cloner.
• Seedling, Vegetation, and Flower cultivator.
• Drying, Curing, and Trimming Specialist.
• Soil Mycelium Specialist.
• Topping
• Caging
• Pruning
• Indoor Lighting knowledge
EXTRACTION: Advanced Cannabis Extraction knowledge:
• Everclear RSO Oil Extraction.
• Dry Ice Kief Extraction and Press.
• Ice Water Bubble Hash/Kief and Press.
• Butane Dabs
• Heat Rosin Extraction
• Cannabis Edibles: Canna-Butter, RSO Black/Coconut Oil, Canna-milk, Canna-Flour, Canna- Chocolate-Canna Juice.  
 
OTHER: Bobcat, Skid Steer, Wheel Loader, Scissor Lift, Box Truck, and Auto Driver. Stone Thermalist/Stone Cutting Specialist, Lifeguard-CPR and Defibulator Certified (2002-2004), Traveling CXO. House Flipping Business Owner
 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
 
Cannabis Grow Specialist/Extractor: Owner/ Producer. 2010- Present.
*Specialties: Outdoor Caging and Indoor Scrog Cultivation. Soil Mycelium Specialist.
 
House Flipper/Owner: Marion Investments. 2012-2014. Locate housing properties for potential investment opportunities, Legal and realtor inspections, employee hires. Painting, plumbing, and construction.
 
Exterminator: A3 Superior Pest Control, Pennsylvania. 2010-2012. Served three states NY, NJ, PA for pest control. Responsible for driving, loading 200-pound heaters and cables into customers homes. Implementation of process from start to finish.
 
Laborer: Home Depot, Maine. 2009. Responsible for tearing down and rebuilding in store garden structures (50ftx20ft) and driving the scissor lift on location.
 
Resident Technician: St. Joseph’s Center, Scranton, PA. 2009-2011. Responsible for patient care. Duties included: Feeding, G-Tube Feedings, O2 tanks, rehabilitation.
 
Sports Palace Attendant: Ceaser’s Cove Haven, Lake Ariel, PA. 2004-2009. Responsible for maintenance of tennis, bocce, ice-skating, and pool hall areas. Grass cutting, leaf blowing, pool cleaning, house keeping, and heavy lifting of materials as needed. Snowmobile and waterski instructor.
 
 
 
References:
 
Elle Alexander: Television Casting Director. Los Angeles, CA. 917.215.8280
Aimee Skelton: Manager of Ceaser’s Cove Haven. Lake Ariel, PA. 570.407.8551
Marie Woody: Head of Administration at St. Josephs. Scranton, PA. 570.342.8379
